=== Introduction ===

This specification is an overview of the more detailed feature-goal lists
for subsystems of Launchpad, each of which are preparing for a 1.0 release
announcement during the Breezy development cycle.

* MaloneOneDotZero<<BR>>
* RosettaOneDotZero<<BR>>
* SoyuzOneDotZero<<BR>>
* TheHatcheryOneDotZero<<BR>>
* FoafOneDotZero<<BR>>
* InfrastructureOneDotZero

For more information, see https://wiki.launchpad.canonical.com/LaunchpadOneDotZero
